      • setClickThreshold

        public void setClickThreshold(float clickThreshold)
        Set the pressure sensitivity for registering a click
        Parameters:
        clickThreshold - threshold 0...1.0f inclusive. 0 will cause clicks to never be reported, 1.0 is a very hard click
